  • public class CartSeat
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the position and properties of a seat in a train, where a player or other entity can sit in

      • getMountedEntityId

        public int getMountedEntityId(org.bukkit.entity.Player viewer)
        Gets the Entity Id of the Entity that is mounted inside the cart directly. Returns -1 if no entity is mounted as part of this seat.
        Parameters:
        viewer -
        Returns:
        mounted entity id
